mapper.select: SELECT `ACCOUNT_MONTH` AS `month`, `CITY_CODE` AS `cityCode`, `PRODUCT_CODE` AS `productCode`, `ACCOUNT_TYPE_CODE` AS `typeCode`, `UPDATE_TIME` AS `updateTime`, `ACCOUN_FEE` AS `fee` FROM `operator`.`rp_account_gather_t`;

SELECT `PRODUCT_CODE` AS `productCode`, `PRODUCT_NAME` AS `productName`, `USE_FLAG` AS `useFlag`, `USE_ACCOUNT` AS `useAccount`, `USE_CARD_SALE` AS `cardSale`, `USE_BALANCE` AS `useBalance`, `USE_PRE_FEE` AS `usePreFee`, `USE_BUSINESS_FEE` AS `useBusinessFee` FROM `operator`.`rp_product_code_t`;
